reviewText:
the entire game looks like those terrible 90's compressed cgi full motion video things that play before you begin a game.

there are no options, period.
so the music is way too quiet, turning it up leads to excruciating beeps and boops that i guess serve as a notification.  none of my actions made any noise.

graphics as i mentioned, are just awful. no options there either. chugs like a chungus. made in UNREAL engine.

Upon launch, you are greeted with a dreadful menu that has three things to click on. PLAY, TUTORIAL, QUIT. Even worse, they have those three things repeated right next to their english counterparts, now in russian. One of the worst UIs i have ever seen.
http://imgur.com/oFQOkVD
yep. that's all you get.

if you can stomache all that, you will get to the gameplay . which is just using spatulas and a flip motion to turn things. otherwise its you against crrrrrrraazzzy physics that will make any simple task into an unfunny unoriginal unfunny wrestling match.

when i started my first playthrough, this is what i was greeted with
http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=516505798
http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=516505965

i don't even have the words.



now onto the developer drama.

The developers are greedy and love censorship, and here's some reasons for why.

the day this came out, there was none of that brand new 10 percent off launch discount.
nope, it was a flat 19.99 dollars. 19.99 dollars for THIS.

so i went to their old greenlight page to see just who's responsible for this trainwreck because the developers aren't even posting comments on their own forum. they don't even watch to show their own faces" to own up to this crime.

so there's "nice" aka alex wardle (according to their youtube account) who on their greenlight page would just spam emotes
recommended: and just act like your general 15 year old meming kid on the internet that you just want to thump on the head. over and over.\n\nNow i was given a free key
hoursPlayed: because the developer is actually handing them out like candy
voteText: hoping for positive reviews. I don't think many people are actually paying real money for this
helpfulPercent: and if they did... I'm sorry to hear that.\n\nAlso
votesHelpful:
there's "paleface" who has a VAC ban on their steam account. http://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561198058948330
they're Russians. (not surprised)

*note* both profiles are private and have been well before I wrote this review.

By the way

column43: 182 of 196 people (93%) found this review helpful 18 people found this review funny

reviewText:
I very much don't agree with these kinds of games. Making the controls bad isn't challenge its just bad controls, Another very bad thing about this is the glitches, allow me to list some of them off.

-The food sometimes just blows up

-The orders on the screens just go away

-When i closed the game and reopened it I was transported to day 2 for no reason

-The first time i pressed the tutorial button i had to quit the game because it would not close the pop up when i pressed said tutorial button

And i am sure those arent the only ones. But i can see how this game could be fun, If there were just a bit more work into the game and maybe a tutorial about the game so i don't press everything on my key board to find out one thing. On things to add, There is nothing. Do not add anything at the moment just focus at making the game less glitchy, The way it is right now i cannot give it a rating higher than a 1/10

Just because of this low score i do not think you should give up game making, No game is perfect and no developer is perfect. I look forward to the next game you are working on no matter what it may be.

reviewText:
some kid on the internet told me to go back to the kitchen.
i decided to buy this thinking it simulated being in the kitchen.

no.

everything about this game is absolutely awkward, even the menu and audio. don't even make me get into the controls.

the models remind me of sofloantonio.

pros:
+ you can refund it because it's impossible to have over 2 hours of play time
+ good at being a bad game
+ trading cards

cons
- literally everything else
- toxic-ruski-tier devs

buy this if you want to end your life, maybe if it came from a $1 bundle.

reviewText:
Okey, it isn't the best game out there but it could be better if you improve some of the things I included in this review.


To begin with the graphics is pretty okey but it's very hard to grab things / see what the customers want. I can imagine it would be fun if you improve some things. So YET it isn't worth to buy it for proper gameplay but if they improve it it defentivly can.



Heres some things that you can improve:
Make it easier to grab things
Better and more clear menu
Make it easier to see what the customers want
A proper toturial

reviewText:
I recieved a coupon for this game.
So I bought it.
Immediate regrets joy.

So many question:
-Why is my kitchen filling proggresively wih gas? (This ain't Auschwitz yo)
-Why is my whole restaurant running on a generator that stops working after 1min of gameplay? (This ain't camping yo)
-Why is there a slo-mo button? (like seriously? slo-mo attempts at grabbing food with a spatula that has the hitbox of a midget's arm?)
-Why does this game exist?
-Why can I flip people off?
-Why do I have a huge ♥♥♥ safe in my kitchen?
-Why do people look like they put their forearms in toasters?
-Why do I have a collection of midgets on my shelf?
-Why isn't there a GOTY edition of this masterpiece?

Did you want a fun enjoyable game with intelligent and cool gameplay mechanics?
Buy this game instead.
Are you unsure about wether to kill yourself or not?
Buy this game.

This game literally runs at 20fps 60fps for me.
I refunded this game and bought a CS:GO skin that i betted away and won nothing: it was way more enjoyable crap and i regret it because this game is the bomb yo.
Don't Buy this game pls.

Pls r8 m8

reviewText: This game requires loads of concentration! It is an extremely funny game, you will end up laughing at yourself after hours of pain trying to cook some food! The controls are difficult to master but it should stay that way. In this game you will have an endless amount of problems to solve, eg. Generator running empty(#LoadShedding2) & something that will never happen to 99% of us, there will be a ton of people queing for our food! It has an extremely cartooney based design, and the orders are funny as heck! I mean you're customers order BRAINS"!!! LIKE AWESOME!\n\nOverall I think this game is gonna be worth it!"
